results.summary: A second man is arrested on suspicion of the murder of an 18-year-old rapper in Birmingham on Friday night.
results.body: <body xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/8ca657f1-8465-de43-a57a-9b2c70df61d2"><image id="70066388"/><paragraph role="introduction">A second man has been arrested on suspicion of murdering an 18-year-old rapper who was stabbed to death after a tribute event for a knife murder victim.</paragraph><paragraph>Joshua Ribera died in hospital after he was stabbed outside TC's club in Selly Oak, Birmingham, on Friday night.</paragraph><paragraph>Police said an 19-year-old from Edgbaston was arrested after attending Bloxwich Police Station at 14:20 BST.</paragraph><paragraph>An 18-year-old man who was arrested on Saturday remains in police custody.</paragraph><paragraph>Investigations into the stabbing are ongoing, West Midlands Police said. </paragraph><paragraph>Mr Ribera, from the Moseley area of Birmingham, used the stage name Depzman.</paragraph><crosshead>'Vital information'</crosshead><paragraph>A post-mortem examination revealed he died from a stab wound to the heart.</paragraph><paragraph>Police were called to Coronation Road just before 23:00 on Friday by the ambulance service. </paragraph><image id="63213441"/><paragraph>The attack came after an event in memory of <!-- CPS Asset ID: 24197860 --><link><caption>Kyle Sheehan</caption><url platform="highweb" href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-birmingham-19769384"/></link> who was stabbed in the leg in the Bartley Green area of Birmingham on 21 September 2012.</paragraph><paragraph>Part of Coronation Road remains cordoned off as investigations continue at the scene.</paragraph><paragraph>Appealing for further information, Det Insp Gary Plant, said: "There are still a number of people who haven't been spoken to by police. A lot of Joshua's friends were at the function and may have vital information about what happened and we urge them to come forward."</paragraph><crosshead>'Beautiful, talented son'</crosshead><paragraph>Paying tribute to her son, Joshua's mother, Alison Cope wrote on her Facebook page: "The most beautiful son a mum could ask for has been taken from me. All who know me know he was my world, my everything.</paragraph><paragraph>"I loved him with every bit of my heart and my heart is now broken. He was kind, caring, funny, affectionate, beautiful and talented. </paragraph><paragraph>"He was stabbed in the heart and they tried for six hours to save him but he needed to go.  </paragraph><paragraph>"I love you Josh and I don't know how I can go on without my baby boy xxx".</paragraph></body>
results.shortFormBody: <shortFormBody xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/8ca657f1-8465-de43-a57a-9b2c70df61d2"><paragraph>A second man has been arrested on suspicion of murdering an 18-year-old rapper who was stabbed to death after a tribute event for a knife murder victim.</paragraph><paragraph>Joshua Ribera died in hospital after he was stabbed outside TC's club in Selly Oak, Birmingham, on Friday night.</paragraph><paragraph>Police said an 19-year-old from Edgbaston was arrested after attending Bloxwich Police Station at 14:20 BST.</paragraph><paragraph>An 18-year-old man who was arrested on Saturday remains in police custody.</paragraph></shortFormBody>

63213441.caption: Kyle Sheehan died after he was stabbed in the leg

70066388.caption: The stabbing happened outside TC's in the Selly Oak area of Birmingham

items.summary: An 18-year-old rapper is stabbed to death in Birmingham after attending a tribute event to a knife murder victim.
items.headline: Rapper Depzman stabbed to death after Kyle Sheehan tribute

results.headline: Joshua Ribera: Second arrest in murder investigation
